achievements:

experiences.title: Cofounder and Full Stack Software Engineer
duties: Conceived and developed an innovative approach to traditional loyalty systems for retail businesses through a combination of white labeled gamified mobile app and merchant portal for configuration, promotion and analytics.
Designed and developed the mobile application in Javascript using Ionic 3 & Angular frameworks.
Designed and developed the CMS and analytics platform in Javascript using Firebase, NodeJS and MongoDB on the backend.
Pivoted and changed the product multiple times based on customer feedback as well as feedback from business owners interacting with the software solution.

experiences.title: Cofounder and Mobile Developer
duties: Conceived and developed mobile applications for both iOS and Android devices in Objective-C and Java.
Conceived and developed "Ad mediation server" in PHP and MySQL which controlled the delivery of ads across all our apps to help maximize revenue.
Developed a push notification script in PHP that allowed millions of push notifications to be sent across all our apps in an efficient and cost effective way.
Created a mobile app that was featured in New York Times and generated 3.1 million downloads.
Conceived and developed hundreds of mobile apps which have generated over 21 million downloads and billions of ad impressions.

experiences.title: Customer Support Engineer, Team Lead, Tech Lead
duties: Responsible for resolving technical issues for customers globally.
Point of escalation for technical issues for engineers locally as well as worldwide.
Provide training and mentoring to fellow engineers on varied number of technologies.
Resolved over 2000 customer issues with an average feedback score rating of 4.69 / 5.

experiences.title: Business Technical Analyst, Programmer
duties: Conceived and developed the 'Report Manager' application using VB .NET, SQL Server 2000 and SPSS which improved the current electronic report production process of IMS Health by 500%. A monthly process that use to take 2 weeks was reduced to 2 days.
Conceived and developed the 'Quality Report Tool' application using PHP, MySQL which automated the process of QA reports for errors.
Received ‘Award of Excellence’ in recognition of outstanding work ethics and performance.

experiences.title: IT & Production Team Leader, Acting
duties: Served as an IT and Production Team Leader while the organization was restructuring.
Ensured strategic IT and production needs of the organization were met during this time.
Served as the escalation point for complex problems and ensured that high quality and effective solutions are delivered on time.
Lead, trained and mentored 5 IT and production staff
Extended systems support to cover India, Japan and Korea.

Successfully managed the development of our first multi-lingual product which allowed the organization to deliver the product from conception within 3 months.  This helped the organization to double their revenue from 3 to 6 millions dollars a year.
Successfully project managed the installation and configuration of VPN access for all employees.

experiences.title: Systems Engineer
duties: Responsible for managing network equipment used to secure sales.
Maintained network hardware and loan pool software.
Ensured the construction of the IForce centre was completed on time and within required specifications.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
duties: Developed, installed and debugged custom applications.
